short.ar: مرسلالمرسل المميز. تصفية الأرقام وإرسال الرسائل والمرفقات والمزيد.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Premium Sender. Filter numbers, send messages, attachments and more.
short.fr: Expéditeur Premium. Filtrez les numéros, envoyez des messages, des pièces jointes et plus encore.
short.hi: Premium Sender. नंबर्स को फ़िल्टर करे, एक साथ एक से ज्यादा मैसेज और अटैचमेंट भेजे ।
short.id: Pengirim Premium. Filter nomor, kirim pesan, lampiran, dan lainnya.
short.ru: Премиум-отправитель. Фильтруйте номера, отправляйте сообщения, вложения и многое другое.

long.ar,fr,hi,id,ru:
You will get one click emojis, Download and save unsaved contacts, filter non-WhatsApp number and many more things.

* Connect customers without saving numbers in your device.
* Connect with any country customers.
* Easy integration with Google Sheet/Excel Sheet.
* Very simple and fast to use.
* Use text formatting
* Name customisation in message
* Send image, video, audio, file attachments
* Filter WhatsApp numbers
* Give contacts an option to unsubscribe
* Download saved/unsaved contacts/numbers from groups, broadcast lists and 
* Download/export/save all contacts

Disclaimer:
This Google Chrome plugin is not endorsed or certified by WhatsApp Inc. 
This is only enhancement tool for WhatsApp Web to help you out.

This extension is not meant for automated spamming. If you try to spam people your number might get banned by whatsapp.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Send Greetings, Offers and subscription reminders to your clients.

 Easy integration with Excel Sheet.

 Name customization in message
